Player History
Had first career hit on 5/29/1965, off Turk Farrell (PIT)...
Injured on 4/18/1970 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Released by Atlanta on 4/8/1972...
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1975...
Injured on 5/13/1976 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/2/1976, off Bill Slayback (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/2/1976, off Fred Scherman (CAL)...
Traded from Cleveland to Los Angeles on 3/2/1979 (Going to LA: C K. Moreland. Going to CLE: P H. Dues, 2B M. DeJohn, C J. Ransom)...
